box: Continuous commitment is required to build legal, financial and growth structures for helping FOSS businesses of different kinds including FOSS-focussed Indian start-ups (like Coopon, Chiguru Tec) and pro-FOSS financial offerings (like Tidelift, Open Collective) that help with this structure.
These organizations have strong FOSS contribution guidelines to help with their hiring.
Apache Superset, a data visualization tool, which was first created by AirBnB and then entered the Apache incubator for sustained contribution from the community
